title: MCP Servers
description: Manage Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for cross-CLI integration

codex.readOnlyNotice: Codex MCP servers are managed via config.toml and cannot be edited here.
codex.editableNotice: This server can be edited. Changes will be saved to config.toml.

deleteConfirm.title: Remove Server "{name}"?
deleteConfirm.description: This will remove "{name}" from your Codex config.toml file. This action cannot be undone.

windows.title: Windows Compatibility
windows.description: Some MCP server commands require Windows-specific configuration for proper execution.
windows.autoFixHint: This will wrap commands with 'cmd /c' prefix for Windows compatibility.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search servers by name or command...

deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the MCP server "{name}"?

emptyState.title: No MCP Servers Found

form.templatePlaceholder: Select a template to pre-fill the form
form.name: Server Name
form.envPlaceholder:

API_KEY=your_key
DEBUG=true
form.envHint: Enter one key=value pair per line

validation.nameExists: A server with this name already exists

ccw.title: CCW MCP Server
ccw.description: Special built-in MCP server for CCW file operations and memory management

read_file.name: read_file
read_file.desc: Read a single file with optional line pagination

read_many_files.name: read_many_files
read_many_files.desc: Read multiple files or directories with glob filtering and content search

ask_question.name: ask_question
ask_question.desc: Ask interactive questions through A2UI interface

smart_search.name: smart_search
smart_search.desc: Intelligent code search with fuzzy and semantic modes

team_msg.name: team_msg
team_msg.desc: Persistent JSONL message bus for Agent Team communication

paths.label: Path Configuration
paths.enableSandbox: Enable Sandbox (restrict to workspace files only)

actions.uninstallConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall CCW MCP?
actions.uninstallScopeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove CCW MCP from {scope}?

conflict.title: Scope Conflict
conflict.description: This server exists in both project and global scopes. The {scope} version is used at runtime.
conflict.resolution: Consider removing this server from one of the scopes.

recommended.title: Recommended Servers
recommended.description: Quickly install popular MCP servers with one click

ace.name: ACE Tool

exa.name: Exa Search
exa.description: AI-powered web search with real-time crawling capabilities

configType.label: Config Format
configType.switchWarning: Switching config format will not migrate existing servers. You'll need to reconfigure servers in the new format.

crossCli.title: Copy MCP Servers Between CLIs
crossCli.selectServersHint: Choose servers to copy. Configuration will be transformed for the target CLI format.

projects.title: Projects Overview
projects.description: View MCP server configurations for all projects

crossProject.title: Cross-Project Import
crossProject.description: Import MCP server configurations from other projects

otherProjects.title: Other Projects
otherProjects.description: Discover and import MCP servers from your other projects
otherProjects.hint: Imported servers will be added to your current project configuration
